alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:34PM EDT until June 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GADSDEN AND NORTHEASTERN LEON COUNTIES... At 534 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Quincy, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Quincy, Midway, Havana, Ralford Greenway, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Littman, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Darsey, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Miccosukee, Fred George Park, Santa Clara, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest and Chaires. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
